_header: Saint Valentine of custom year by year
Subjects: Valentine, saint; Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; envoys
_description: John Lydgate, ‘Valentine to Our Lady’ — twenty stanzas rhyme royal, including 2-stanza envoy

BodAsh57.First Lines:
SAinteValentyne of custume yeere by yeereMen haue an vsaunce with
                    in þis RegyounTo looke and seche Cupides KalundereAnd chese
                    þeire choys by gret affeccyoun…
BodAsh57.Last Lines:
…Have on vs mercy whane we for helpe calleffor love of hir
                    þat þus excelliþe alle
BodAsh57.Attributed Title:
Here foloweþe nowe a glorious Invocacoun to oure blessed ladye made by
                    þat vertuous Lidegate in balade wyse in cheosing of Valantynes at þat
                    selff feeste with þe Refrayde I love one best of alle (f. 52)

CamTCC600.First Lines:
Seynt Valentyne of custume yeere by yeereMen haue an vsaunce in
                    þis RegyounTo looke and serche Cupydes kalundereAnd cheese
                    þeyre choys by gret affeccioun…
CamTCC600.Last Lines:
…Haue on vs mercy whane we for help calleffor loue of hir
                    þat excelleþe alle
CamTCC600.Attributed Author: by daun Iohan Lidegate þe Munke of Bury (p. 145)
CamTCC600.Attributed Title:
Lo here beginneþe a balade made at þe reuerence of our lady by
                    daun Iohan Lidegate þe Munke of Bury in wyse of chesing loues at saint
                    Valentynes day (p. 145); Balade for saint Valentynes daye (RT)
CamTCC600.Editions:
Mahir,  Otto,
                        ed.  
             Eine religiöse Gedichte John Lydgates.
         Oberviechtach: Adolf Mahir, 1910: 31-7.
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.

BLAdd29729.First Lines:
Saynt valentyne of custome yeare by yearemen haue an vsaunce in
                    this regyon…
BLAdd29729.Last Lines:
…haue on vs mercy whan we for helpe calleffor loue of hur
                    þat excelleth all
BLAdd29729.Attributed Title:
Lo here beginneth a balade made at the reuerence of our lady by dane Iohan
                    lidegate þe munke of bury in wyse of chesinge loues at sainte valentynes
                    daye (f. 155)

BLHar2251.First Lines:
SEynt Valentyne of custom yeere by yeereMen have an vsaunce in this
                    Regioun…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…Have on vs mercy whan we for help calleffor love of hir that
                    excellith alle
